Robert M. Pirsig
Robert M. Pirsig was the author of Zen and the Art of Motorcycle Maintenance.
Behind the scenes
Robert M. Pirsig (September 6, 1928 – April 24, 2017) was an American author, best known for his books, Zen and the Art of Motorcycle Maintenance and Lila: An Inquiry Into Morals.
